on reading compounds: 鞭撻【ベンタツ】encouragement, urging, spurring on, chastising by whipping
教鞭【キョウベン】teacher's cane, teacher's pointer
kun reading compounds: 鞭【むち】whip, lash, scourge, stick, cane, rod, pointer
鞭入れ【むちいれ】whipping (horse racing), using the whip
飴と鞭【あめとむち】carrot and stick, candy and whip
鞭打つ【むちうつ】to whip, to lash, to give the rod, to spur on, to encourage
